title: Fallout 3 - DLC Pack
description:
This ISO contains everything necessary to successfully install all 3 Bethesda Softworks DLCs for Fallout 3: Operation Anchorage, The Pitt & Broken Steel.

[b]Install Instructions[/b]
- Mount ISO with DAEMON Tools.
- The ISO contains an autorun and a menu that should come up instantly after mounting the image, if it doesn't you'll have to browse to the mounted drive and run "cdstarter.exe" manually.
- You should now see a window like [url=http://img23.imageshack.us/img23/8001/autoruno.png]this one.[/url]
- Click on "Install DLCs", a custom installer like [url=http://img27.imageshack.us/img27/1486/installdlcs1.png]this one[/url] will open up, proceed with the installation (warning: if you go to another window while installing the installer will most likely look like it's frozen but it isn't, just wait for it to finish).
- When that is done (and assuming you haven't updated to version 1.5, otherwise skip this), click on "Install US 1.5 Patch" if you have the US version of Fallout 3 (if you downloaded it, this is the most likely one) or click on "Install UK 1.5 Patch" if you have an UK/European version of Fallout 3.
- After the update finishes installing, click on "Install FallOut Mod Manager" if you don't have it installed yet and proceed by following the instructions.
- Finally, you can close the menu. Run FallOut Mod Manager and activate all the esm files in their respective order of release [url=http://img26.imageshack.us/img26/8629/fommconfig.png]as seen here[/url].
- In order to run the game, either create a shortcut to the file "fose_loader.exe" which can be found in the main Fallout 3 folder or open up FallOut Mod Manager and click on "Launch FOSE".

[b]More Info[/b]
The ISO, Autorun and the Pack Installer were created by me (SozSurt/Technopath), [u]this torrent does not include Fallout 3 itself, only the DLCs Operation Anchorage, The Pitt and Broken Steel. You'll need to download Fallout 3 itself from another torrent.[/u]

[b]Files installed by the DLC Pack Setup[/b]
[url=http://img6.imageshack.us/img6/2286/filesinstalled1main.png]To "Fallout 3" Folder[/url]
[url=http://img18.imageshack.us/img18/7203/filesinstalled2data.png]To "Fallout 3/Data" Folder[/url]
[url=http://img15.imageshack.us/img15/9321/filesinstalled3video.png]To "Fallout 3/Data/Video" Folder[/url]

I'll seed at least until there are a few more seeds (in case there are 0 seeds it means I'm playing online and I turned uTorrent off but do not worry, I'll be back soon enough).

Finally, enjoy :)
